participant_1.background:
I'm not rich, but I love technology and I have a sweet tooth.
I work out in my home gym to keep fit.
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
i work at a grocery store.
i love bruno mars.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to be a better support to my wife during this difficult time.
until then i will make 215 an hour.
I make jokes to cheer myself up.
my favorite drink is dr pepper.
my dog is the ring bearer.

content.text: Hey! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am doing good as well. I am excited for the future! I am moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
That is awesome! I am sure you will be successful. I am trying to learn how to be a better support to my wife during this difficult time.
I am sure you will be a great support to her. What is she going through?
She is struggling with some health issues, but we are working through it together.
I am sorry to hear that. I am glad you are working through it together.
Thank you. I like to make jokes to cheer myself up.
That is a great way to cope with difficult situations. I love to make jokes too.

I have a few, but my favorite is about a guy who walks into a bar and asks for 10 shots of Dr. Pepper. The bartender asks him why he wants 10 shots of Dr. Pepper, and the guy says, "Because I am trying to get my wife to have twins!"
Haha! That is a good one. I will have to remember that one.
I am glad you liked it. I have a lot of jokes, so if you ever want to hear more, just let me know.
I will definitely let you know if I want to hear more jokes. I am always looking for a good laugh
